comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111006182035

Steps to reproduce:

I would close a tab with a click on the x 


Actual results:

I use colorful tabs. Some time the  x is in a similar color like the tab.  


Expected results:

please put the tab close  "x" on a red background like in other programs
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111006182035

Steps to reproduce:

I would close a tab with a click on the x 


Actual results:

I use colorful tabs. Some time the  x is in a similar color like the tab.  


Expected results:

please put the tab close  "x" on a red background like in other programs
This is an addon issue. Should it be fixed by Firefox?
comments.raw_text: This is an addon issue. Should it be fixed by Firefox?
